successfullyCreateProject: You have successfully created the project, click the "Send" button to verify the entered data and publish your project
profilePicture: Profile picture can be .png, .jpeg or .gif only

Confirmation.yourAccount: Your account is under review. Please wait for an administrator verdict.

displayProject.youCanAdd: You can create multiple goals. The total amount of the project will consist of the sum of all the objectives.

generalInfo.projectNameDesc: The name should be concise, unique and memorable. Be sure that the name of the project reflects its essence.
generalInfo.shortDescDesc: Describe in one sentence the purpose of your project.
generalInfo.goalsErrorMsg: The project must contain at least one financial goal
generalInfo.finansialGoalsDesc: You can create multiple goals. The total amount of the project will consist of the sum of all the objectives
generalInfo.projectTagsDesc: Thanks to these tags, users will find it easier to find your project. Tags should match the content of the project

description.projectDescUsing: Use the description of the project in order to tell in more detail about what and how you are going to do. Add pictures and photos to more clearly present the project.
